gw.plugin.document

Class IDocumentTemplateSource

  • gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IDocumentTemplateSource
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    An interface fronting access to template documents e.g., for generating letters or forms. An implementation may simply store templates in a local repository, or, a more sophisticated implementation might interface with a remote document management system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor getDocumentTemplate(String strTemplateId)
      Returns the document template without locale information for the template id.
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor getDocumentTemplate(String strTemplateId, ILocale locale)
      Returns the document template for the template id and the given locale
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor[] getDocumentTemplates(Date date, Map<K,V> valuesToMatch, int maxResults)
      Returns an array of document templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
      InputStream getTemplateAsStream(String strTemplateId)
      Returns an InputStream for the specified template name/id. The format of the template id is implementation specific. A template is a document e.g., Word document, Excel file, PDF form, etc.
      InputStream getTemplateAsStream(String strTemplateId, ILocale locale)
      Returns an InputStream for the specified template name/id. The format of the template id is implementation specific. A template is a document e.g., Word document, Excel file, PDF form, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentTemplate

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor getDocumentTemplate(String strTemplateId)
        Returns the document template without locale information for the template id.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateId - The template id.
        Returns:
        A document template instance corresponding to the specified template id.

      • getDocumentTemplate

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor getDocumentTemplate(String strTemplateId,
                                              ILocale locale)
        Returns the document template for the template id and the given locale
        Parameters:
        strTemplateId - the template id
        locale - locale in which the document will be generated. A default template will be picked on null value
        Returns:
        A document template instance corresponding to the specified template id and locale

      • getDocumentTemplates

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor[] getDocumentTemplates(Date date,
                                                 Map<K,V> valuesToMatch,
                                                 int maxResults)
        Returns an array of document templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        date - A date which should fall between the effective and expiration dates for each template to be returned
        valuesToMatch - A map of property value names -> values to match in the templates. Values to be matched should be Strings or String[]s (if there is a legal set of values)
        maxResults - The maximum number of results which should be returned
        Returns:
        An array of document templates matching the specified criteria.

      • getTemplateAsStream

        InputStream getTemplateAsStream(String strTemplateId)
        Returns an InputStream for the specified template name/id. The format of the template id is implementation specific. A template is a document e.g., Word document, Excel file, PDF form, etc.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateId - An implementation specific identifier for a template.
        Returns:
        An input stream for reading the template, or null if the template could not be found or the caller doesn't have adequate privileges to get the template.

      • getTemplateAsStream

        InputStream getTemplateAsStream(String strTemplateId,
                              ILocale locale)
        Returns an InputStream for the specified template name/id. The format of the template id is implementation specific. A template is a document e.g., Word document, Excel file, PDF form, etc.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateId - An implementation specific identifier for a template.
        locale - locale in which the document will be generated. A default template will be picked on null value
        Returns:
        An input stream for reading the template, or null if the template could not be found or the caller doesn't have adequate privileges to get the template.
